original_text:
He prowled among the lions,
    for he was now a strong lion.
He learned to tear the prey
    and he became a man-eater.
korean_text: 젊은 사자가 되매 여러 사자 가운데에 왕래하며 먹이 물어뜯기를 배워 사람을 삼키며

sentences.original_text: for he was now a strong lion
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그는 강한 사자가 되었기 때문이었고

sentences.original_text: He learned to tear the prey
